website_summaries.verdict: Jabra's FreeSpeak BT250 offers an impressive mix of comfort, ease of use, and performance.

customer_reviews.title: not as advertised!!!  received bag of powder mix only & no scoop, not pictured canister
customer_reviews.text: What I received was just a bag of the powdered mix with no scoop, not the canister as shown. The bag I received would most likely be used in its entirety to make up a cooler full of gatorade such as sports teams use at events. This is not what is pictured or described, and not what I wanted (or ordered!) or expected for use at home. Pretty aggravating. Had to split up the powder in a couple canning jars and fortunately, still had a scoop from our last canister to use for measuring. I will not buy from this seller again.
customer_reviews.author: Jane Smith

customer_reviews.title: Poor shelf life
customer_reviews.text: Good size and price- but the shelf life looks like only one year. Was hoping to get more time out of it....
customer_reviews.author: A. Livieratos

customer_reviews.title: Tastes good
customer_reviews.text: I drink it daily for the electrolytes. Good flavor also.
customer_reviews.author: scotty

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: So easy to mix in a pitcher much better then plastic bottles and destroying the environment
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Kind of nuts to not mix your own energy drinks
customer_reviews.text: Great way to avoid shipping heavy liquid all over the place just for an energy drink. Plus, mix it how you like it in your own bottle. Saves money, saves packaging, saves energy.
customer_reviews.author: fungusamongus

customer_reviews.title: Great for long bike rides
customer_reviews.text: I use this stuff for bike rides of about 25 miles or more. Works great.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Indvik

customer_reviews.title: Be careful!
customer_reviews.text: The box came banged up and when I opened it it was spilled all over the box and looked like it was wet at some point it was clumpy mad nasty! Went to the trash!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is Gatorade
customer_reviews.text: This is Gatorade. If you follow the directions, it makes a tasty drink. Having it in the powder form will allow you to customize it to your taste which is kind of nice because I don't like mine as sweet. I took this with me when I traveled out of the country and used it in bottled water. Tasted great.
customer_reviews.author: matthew

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love it!! Live overseas and have to order it in, but haven't found anything locally to replace it when kids are sick or it is really hot (or I want to make them popsicles).
customer_reviews.author: HerouxFamily

customer_reviews.title: The Powder that's Legal.
customer_reviews.text: Good old reliable Gatorade orig. Flavor. Will reorder. If anyone takes lasix,it's a good way to keep potassium levels up.
customer_reviews.author: G-Man

customer_reviews.title: Exactly As Expected
customer_reviews.text: Since none of the stores in my little town will carry Gatorade Mix, I appreciate being able to purchase in bulk and receive my purchase in two days. It's much better than winding up with endless numbers of unwanted plastic bottles.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff G

customer_reviews.title: It's gatorade!
customer_reviews.text: I like Gatorade. I prefer drinking water also. I don't want to take up space in my fridge with cans and bottles so I fill up a couple of squeeze bottles of water and put Gatorade powder in the bottles especially before going running or riding.
customer_reviews.author: Jerald D. Lifsey

customer_reviews.title: Great mix for our large event
customer_reviews.text: Great mix for our large event. Kept everyone well hydrated, flavor was not runny, and it didn't clump up!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Menton

customer_reviews.title: Should Have Shopped a Bit Longer
customer_reviews.text: The product is just fine - it's GATORADE, for crying out loud. The low rating is for price. I assumed a decent price on Amazon but should have priced it locally. My wife bought an identical cannister off the shelf at WallyMart for less than half what I paid for this purchase. Live and learn. Shop a little more before you assume a good price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: was thirsty
customer_reviews.text: You really don't find this size of a container in many stores. Though it still cost, I felt it was worth it , buying and have it sent to my home
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just OK in all regards
customer_reviews.text: Too much sugar for my needs. Pricing not so attractive.
customer_reviews.author: Buttons

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Definitely get your money's worth I just wish they wouldn't jack up the prices
customer_reviews.author: Tee

customer_reviews.title: Great product delivered to your door.
customer_reviews.text: Good product and price, plus the convience of home delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Expensive but good
customer_reviews.text: The only issue I had, was the price, gatorade is quite pricy though. If only they made the product more affordable they would get more stars
customer_reviews.author: WarinLife

customer_reviews.title: Good Deal, but no exactly as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: Gatorade is Gatorade, right? Well, now they have G1, G2, and G3. I was looking for G3 - mostly electrolyte replacement meant for after a workout (or during depending on your fancy). I got G2 - it also has electrolytes, but a hefty serving of carbohydrates meant to sustain you mid-workout. I mostly run to not be a fat ass, so more carbs at the end that aren't something awesome like ice cream was a bummer - negligible in the end, but still not what I thought was coming my way when I ordered.
customer_reviews.author: megan

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: Always happy with the Gatorade products, the size is great .
customer_reviews.author: Rob M

customer_reviews.title: Misleading
customer_reviews.text: Came in a bag, not a can. Rather inconvenient and misleading. Other than the powder coming in large bag that was not resealable the price and product were of great value.
customer_reviews.author: Dale

customer_reviews.title: Great for sharing long distance!
customer_reviews.text: My grandson runs track at a boarding school. He loves his Gatorade. His Grandma loves him. So this ready to mix product is a great way to be able to share this product with him. They even make Gatorade bottles for using to mix with water, so he still gets to have the brand name show off!! All flavored are great , so I hear!
customer_reviews.author: Byron

customer_reviews.title: 3-stars is for the flavor, not the product
customer_reviews.text: Odd taste, and like any of these mixes you have to try them to know. We tool a gamble on a big Lemon Lime can and now it sits on he counter waiting to be used (and in the meantime we killed 2x of the orange!). 3-stars is for the flavor, not the product
customer_reviews.author: Blue Hiller

customer_reviews.title: Lemon-lime just happens to be our favorite choice!
customer_reviews.text: Gatorade, no matter whether it is in dry powder form, 8oz.bottles, or even one quart size is my family's go to drink all year long. With the many different flavor available we never tire of drinking Gatorade to.help keep our bodies hydrated no matter what the season. Lemon-lime just happens to be our favorite choice!
customer_reviews.author: madrekatt

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my staff at the dry cleaners and they love it. It is a great help when the temps hit 100
customer_reviews.author: Charles S.

customer_reviews.title: Liquid proof wrapping!
customer_reviews.text: It arrived here on the edge of the Arctic Ocean. The container was completely soaked. ...but, it was wrapped in liquid proof wrapping!!!! This is supposed to help with leg cramps. I fly/travel 21 hours one way and about 14 hours the other way, once a month. The leg cramps are excruciating.....hope this helps.
customer_reviews.author: Easy_As_PI

customer_reviews.title: Gatorade
customer_reviews.text: Great way to get Gatorade and have lots of it on hand. We have the storage and therefore, going to the store and paying their rediculous prices is shameful.
customer_reviews.author: Richard A. Clark

product_meta.title: Gatorade Powdered Drink Mix - LEMON-LIME 50.9 Oz
product_meta.description: Flavor Name:Lemon LimeGatorade replenishes, rehydrates, and rejuvenates so you can keep giving it everything you've got. Gatorade is an optimal combination of fluids, carbs, minerals, designed to quench your body's deepest thirst and refuel working muscles. Gatorade is the science of sweat; It's battle tested, and champion approved.

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
